titleStmt.title: The Anatomy of popery, or, A catalogue of popish errours in doctrine, and corruptions in worship together with the agreement between paganism, pharisaism, and popery.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Milbourne for Tho. Passenger ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in Edinburgh University Library and the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
